mapper.select: SELECT i.content_id, i.content_type_id, i.title, i.addr1, i.addr2, i.zipcode, i.tel, i.first_image, i.first_image2, i.readcount, i.sido_code, i.gugun_code, i.latitude, i.longitude, i.mlevel, d.overview FROM attraction_info i JOIN attraction_description d ON i.content_id = d.content_id WHERE i.readcount >= 1 AND i.content_type_id = 39 AND i.first_image != ''

SELECT m.idx, m.mon, m.region, m.title, m.latitude, m.longitude, MAX(d.overview) as overview, MAX(i.addr1) as addr1, MAX(i.addr2) as addr2, MAX(i.first_image) as first_image FROM attraction_info i JOIN attraction_description d ON i.content_id = d.content_id JOIN monthly m ON i.title LIKE CONCAT('%', m.title, '%') WHERE i.first_image != '' AND m.mon = MONTH(CURDATE()) AND i.content_type_id = 12 GROUP BY m.idx, m.mon, m.region, m.title, m.latitude, m.longitude;

SELECT i.content_id, i.content_type_id, i.title, i.addr1, i.addr2, i.zipcode, i.tel, i.first_image, i.first_image2, i.readcount, i.sido_code, i.gugun_code, i.latitude, i.longitude, i.mlevel, d.overview FROM attraction_info i JOIN attraction_description d ON i.content_id = d.content_id WHERE i.content_id = #{contentId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO plan (user_id, start_date, end_date, comment) VALUES (#{userId}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{comment})
INSERT INTO plan_detail (plan_id, content_id, plan_order) VALUES (#{planId}, #{contentId}, #{order})
mapper.select: SELECT content_id FROM plan_detail WHERE plan_id=#{planId} ORDER BY plan_order ASC
